publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2429 Chris Ballance: Richard Holloway - Chair of the Scottish Arts Councilâ€”That the Parliament welcomes the appointment of Richard Holloway as Chair of the Scottish Arts Council; congratulates him, and congratulates those who made the appointment for finding the right person for the job. Supported by: Mr Jamie Stone*, Richard Baker*, Mike Pringle*, Tommy Sheridan*, Shiona Baird*
S2M-2429 Richard Holloway - Chair of the Scottish Arts Council (lodged on 15 February 2005) Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-2429 Richard Holloway - Chair of the Scottish Arts Council (lodged on 15 February 2005) Eleanor Scott*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-2429 Richard Holloway - Chair of the Scottish Arts Council (lodged on 15 February 2005) Robin Harper*
